title: I Can't Buy Hextech Chests
body: I'm level 2 on my second account and I can't buy hex tech chests from the store, yet I have 1020 rp. Why?

replies.body: You may need to hang on until Level 5, that is when hextech crafting will become available on your account.
Thanks for the reply, I don't really use my account for collecting skins, that's why I made another one for that purpose. So I don't really know when to start buying Chests.
